reviews.review_msg: Alison is a really sweet professor who really is enthusiastic and knowledgeable on the topic. She always went out of her way to engage the class and find guest lecturers and multimedia content to supplement. The material was a little dry as were her lectures, but overall she is such a kind and brilliant prof.

Alison is one of my favourite profs at SFU. She can be a bit disorganized at times, and the content she teaches isn't always the most interesting, but her quirky sense of humour and genuine care for her students more than make up for it. She's been a prof for many years but is still so passionate about her research, which is incredibly refreshing.
